reviewForm.name: Name
reviewForm.fillAllFields: Please fill all fields and select an image.
reviewForm.staticReview1: I had the best experience using this vehicle rental website! The site is incredibly user-friendly, and finding a rental car that suited my needs was a breeze. The booking process was seamless, and the prices were very competitive compared to other rental services.
reviewForm.staticReview2: What impressed me most was the wide range of vehicles available. Whether you need a compact car for city driving or a spacious SUV for a road trip, they have it all! The detailed descriptions and photos of each vehicle helped me make an informed choice.
reviewForm.staticReview3: Customer service was top-notch as well. I had a small issue with my initial booking, but the team was quick to respond and resolve the problem. They even offered an upgrade at no extra charge!

faq.a1: Imperdiet ut tristique viverra nunc. Ultrices orci vel auctor cursus turpis nibh placerat massa. Fermentum urna ut at et in.
faq.q2: Can I rent a car without a credit card?
faq.a2: Yes, but additional verification or deposits may be required.
faq.q3: What are the requirements for renting a car?
faq.a3: A valid driver’s license, age above 21, and a payment method.
faq.q4: Does Car Rental allow me to tow with or attach a hitch to the rental vehicle?
faq.a4: Most rental companies prohibit towing with rental vehicles.
faq.q5: Does Car Rental offer coverage products for purchase with my rental?
faq.a5: Yes, we offer multiple coverage plans to choose from at checkout.

rent_your_vehicle.title: Rent your vehicle
rent_your_vehicle.subtitle: Start a vehicle sharing business now!
rent_your_vehicle.image_alt: Turo host smiling in front of cars
rent_your_vehicle.description1: Take control of your financial future while cultivating your entrepreneurial fire with us, the world’s largest car sharing marketplace.
rent_your_vehicle.description2: Turo gives budding entrepreneurs the tools and resources they need to build a small, successful portfolio of cars to share on the marketplace, and the opportunity to add thousands to their annual income.
rent_your_vehicle.description3: List your first car now to get started, then build your business plan and scale how you want!

benefits_section.title: Built-in infrastructure to
benefits_section.subtitle: get you up & running
benefits_section.description: us provides the tools to help hosts thrive

insurance.title: Insurance included
insurance.description: Rest easy knowing you’re covered with up to $750,000 in third-party liability insurance from Travelers, plus you choose from an array of protection plans that include varying levels of reimbursement for car repairs, up to your car’s actual cash value in case of damage during a trip.

safety.title: Safety & support
safety.description: Get access to 24/7 Customer Support, roadside assistance for your guests, an experienced trust and safety team to support you through thick and thin, and one-on-one business coaching to share market intelligence and help you build a savvy business.

demand.title: Demand generation
demand.description: Get instant access to millions of active guests from around the world, plus marketing and advertising support from us, the world’s largest car sharing marketplace.

app.title: An easy-to-use app
app.description: Manage your business and your bookings seamlessly on the go — manage trips, tweak your pricing, message your guests, and more, all from your phone.
